00011 NetworkConfigurationManager::NetworkConfigurationManager(ros::NodeHandle& handle, NMClient* client,
00012     NMRemoteSettings* remote_settings) :
00013     m_handle(handle), m_client(client), m_remote_settings(remote_settings), connection_sub(
00014         handle.subscribe<NetworkConnections>("oryx_network_connections", 10,
00015             boost::bind(&NetworkConfigurationManager::connections_changed_cb, this, _1))), active_connection_sub(
00016         handle.subscribe<ActiveNetworkConnections>("oryx_active_network_connections", 10,
00017             boost::bind(&NetworkConfigurationManager::active_connections_changed_cb, this, _1))), m_config(
00018         new BlankNetworkConfig())

00022 void NetworkConfigurationManager::load_config_from_file(const char* filename)
00023 {
00024   ROS_INFO("Loading Network Configuration File: %s", filename);
00025   std::vector<NetworkConnectionConfig> configs;
00026   FILE * pFile = fopen(filename, "r");
00027   if (!pFile)
00028   {
00029     ROS_WARN("Error reading config file: %s", filename);
00030     return;
00031   }
00032   char name[100];
00033   int num_read;
00034   num_read = fscanf(pFile, "%[^\n\r]", name);
00035   if (num_read != 1)
00036   {
00037     ROS_WARN("Badly formatted config file: %s", filename);
00038   }
00039   else
00040   {
00041     char iface[100];
00042     char connection_name[100];
00043     do
00044     {
00045       num_read = fscanf(pFile, "%*[ \n\t]%[^,],%[^\n\r]", iface, connection_name);
00046       if (num_read == 2)
00047       {
00048         NetworkConnectionConfig config(iface, connection_name);
00049         configs.push_back(config);
00050       }
00051     } while (num_read == 2);
00052     if (num_read > 0)
00053     {
00054       ROS_WARN("Badly formatted config file: %s. only read %i items on connection line", filename, num_read);
00055     }
00056     else
00057     {
00058       boost::shared_ptr<NetworkConfig> new_config(new NetworkConfig(name, configs));
00059       set_config(new_config);
00060     }
00061 
00062   }
00063 
00064   fclose(pFile);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void NetworkConfigurationManager::set_config(boost::shared_ptr<NetworkConfig> new_config)
00068 {
00069   m_config = new_config;
00070   ROS_INFO("Applying Network Configuration: %s", m_config->get_name().c_str());
00071   update_config();
00072 }

00074 void NetworkConfigurationManager::active_connections_changed_cb(
00075     const ActiveNetworkConnections::ConstPtr& latest_active_connections)
00076 {
00077   m_latest_active_connections = latest_active_connections;
00078   update_config();
00079 }
00080 void NetworkConfigurationManager::connections_changed_cb(const NetworkConnections::ConstPtr& latest_connections)
00081 {
00082   m_latest_connections = latest_connections;
00083   update_config();
00084 }
00085 void NetworkConfigurationManager::update_config()
00086 {
00087   ROS_DEBUG("Cheching Network Config");
00088   const NetworkConnections::ConstPtr connections = m_latest_connections;
00089   const ActiveNetworkConnections::ConstPtr active_connections = m_latest_active_connections;
00090   if (!connections || !active_connections) //haven't yet received any connection data
00091     return;
00092 
00093   if (m_config)
00094   {
00095     m_config->update(active_connections, this);
00096   }
00097 
00098 }
00099 
00100 void NetworkConfig::update(const ActiveNetworkConnections::ConstPtr active_connections, NetworkConfigurationManager* manager) const
00101 {
00102   std::vector<NetworkConnectionConfig>::const_iterator connections_itr = m_connection_configs.begin();
00103   for (; connections_itr != m_connection_configs.end(); ++connections_itr)
00104     connections_itr->update(active_connections, manager);
00105 }
00106 void NetworkConnectionConfig::update(const ActiveNetworkConnections::ConstPtr active_connections, NetworkConfigurationManager* manager) const
00107 {
00108   bool found = false;
00109   std::vector<ActiveNetworkConnection>::const_iterator connection_itr = active_connections->list.begin();
00110   for (; connection_itr != active_connections->list.end(); ++connection_itr)
00111   {
00112     if (connection_itr->connection.name == m_connection_name && connection_itr->device.iface == m_iface)
00113       found = true;
00114   }
00115   if (!found)
00116   {
00117     ROS_INFO("Not connected to %s on %s. Attempting to connect now", m_connection_name.c_str(), m_iface.c_str());
00118     if (!manager->activate_connection(m_iface, m_connection_name))
00119       ROS_WARN("Failed to connect to %s on %s", m_connection_name.c_str(), m_iface.c_str());
00120   }
00121 }
00122 
00123 bool NetworkConfigurationManager::activate_connection(std::string iface, std::string connection_name)
00124 {
00125   const NetworkConnections::ConstPtr connections = m_latest_connections;
00126   if (!connections) //haven't yet received any connection data
00127     return false;
00128 
00129   NMDevice * device = nm_client_get_device_by_iface(m_client, iface.c_str());
00130   if (device == NULL)
00131   {
00132     ROS_WARN("Could not find device: '%s'", iface.c_str());
00133     return false;
00134   }
00135 
00136   //get the connection info to connect to
00137   const char* path = NULL;
00138   std::vector<NetworkConnection>::const_iterator itr = connections->list.begin();
00139   for (; itr != connections->list.end(); ++itr)
00140   {
00141     if (itr->name == connection_name)
00142     {
00143       path = itr->path.c_str();
00144       break;
00145     }
00146   }
00147 
00148   NMConnection * connection = NULL;
00149   if (path != NULL)
00150     connection = NM_CONNECTION(nm_remote_settings_get_connection_by_path(m_remote_settings, path));
00151   if (connection == NULL)
00152   {
00153     ROS_WARN( "Could not find connection: '%s'", connection_name.c_str());
00154     return false;
00155   }
00156 
00157   ROS_INFO( "Activiting Connection: '%s' on %s", connection_name.c_str(), iface.c_str());
00158 
00159   nm_client_activate_connection(m_client, connection, device, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00160 
00161   sleep(1);//block for a second to allow for connection activation to begin
00162 
00163   return true;
00164 }
